discourse_list.title: RWA in end of year break

content.content: Hello everyone, to align with the governance calendar but equally give contributors a break from what was a very charged year, RWA activities will be on hold between the end of day  (UTC) on 23 Dec 2021 to 3 Jan 2022. 2022 is already announcing itself to be a critical year for RWA. Having contributors batteries recharged for that is paramount for sustainability. For very urgent matters contact [email protected]
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
